original_text: And he that was healed wist not who it was: for Jesus had conveyed himself away, a multitude being in that place.
korean_text: 고침을 받은 사람은 그가 누구인지 알지 못하니 이는 거기 사람이 많으므로 예수께서 이미 피하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: And he that was healed wist not who it was:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나음을 받은 그는 그가 누구인지 알지 못했으니

sentences.original_text: for Jesus had conveyed himself away,
a multitude being in that place.
